name: Skiff
description: Proprietary Front-End Application for use with Rhino Security Labs Sandbar project
author: Michael Payne @ Rhino Security Labs

scripts.install:latest: npm install --save-dev typings@* typescript@* istanbul@* jasmine@*
scripts.init: rm -rf .git && npm run install:latest && npm init && git init
scripts.build: npm run build:tsc && npm run bundle
scripts.postbuild: cp -r assets dist/ && mkdir dist/assets/js && cp build/lib/bundle.js dist/assets/js/skiff-$npm_package_version.js && cp index.html dist/
scripts.setup:mock: cd mock && npm run teardown:mock && docker-compose up -d
scripts.bundle:app: browserify --im --fast -x jwt-decode -x moment -x moment-timezone -x popsicle -x react -x react-addons-css-transition-group -x react-dom -x react-redux -x react-router -x react-tap-event-plugin -x redux build/js/main.js > build/lib/bundle.js
scripts.bundle:static: browserify -r jwt-decode -r moment -r moment-timezone -r popsicle -r react -r react-addons-css-transition-group -r react-dom -r react-redux -r react-router -r react-tap-event-plugin -r redux > build/lib/vendor.js
scripts.test: rm -rf build && npm run build:tsc && istanbul cover jasmine
scripts.publish:major: npm version major && npm run prepack && npm publish build
scripts.publish:minor: npm version minor && npm run prepack && npm publish build
scripts.publish:patch: npm version patch && npm run prepack && npm publish build
